raw:
{{Infobox item poe2
| name           = Armor Invoice
| icon           = poe2 small_text_huana icon.png
| description    = Most of this document is drafted in a careful, official hand. Another author appears to have made several hasty additions.

"To our valued customer,

On behalf of the dedicated staff of the Consignment and Salvage Clearinghouse, we thank you for expressing interest in the purchase of (1 mail vest, enchantments unknown, previous owner Magnera Freetrader).

Unfortunately, our licensed dealer, (Rimo Caldera, salvage marker 56221), informed us (item unavailable, delivery to be carried out by Captain Henqua but shipment interdicted by pirate hunters, vessel sunk). This is most regrettable.

Enclosed is your original payment of (Vailian trade bullion, amount undisclosed, minus ten percent finder's fee). We certainly hope you will consider future business with us, despite this setback.

Sincerest regards, Rowen Gjakon, shipping quartermaster, CaSC

Dealer notes, if any: (not certain if vest went down with Henqua. Will make further inquiries.)"
| added_in       = poe2
